title: Royal Malaysian Navy Ship Crew Evacuated Due To Flooding After Underwater Collision
content: The crew of a Royal Malaysian Navy (RMN) ship was evacuated due to heavy flooding, following a collision with an underwater object off the coast of Johor state.
summary: The crew of a Royal Malaysian Navy (RMN) ship was evacuated due to heavy flooding, following a collision with an underwater object off the coast of Johor state.

title: Apple To Boost iPhone Production, Focus On Pro And Pro Max Models
content: Apple is gearing up for a substantial increase in iPhone production for the upcoming year, with a particular emphasis on its Pro and Pro Max models.
summary: Apple is gearing up for a substantial increase in iPhone production for the upcoming year, with a particular emphasis on its Pro and Pro Max models.

title: Australian Employees Now Have Right To Ignore Work Calls After Office Hours
content: Australian employees can now ignore work calls and other intrusions into home life thanks to a new "right to disconnect" law designed to curb the creep of work emails and calls into personal lives.
summary: Australian employees can now ignore work calls and other intrusions into home life thanks to a new "right to disconnect" law designed to curb the creep of work emails and calls into personal lives.

title: 20 Dead, Over 5 Million Affected In Bangladesh Floods
content: At least 20 people have died and more than 5.2 million have been affected in Bangladesh by floods caused by relentless monsoon rains and overflowing rivers, officials said on Sunday.
summary: At least 20 people have died and more than 5.2 million have been affected in Bangladesh by floods caused by relentless monsoon rains and overflowing rivers, officials said on Sunday.

title: 4 Killed, 37 Injured In Russian Attack On Ukraine, Say Local Authorities
content: Russia launched attacks on northern, eastern and southern Ukraine, killing at least four people and injuring 37, Ukrainian military and local authorities said on Sunday.
summary: Russia launched attacks on northern, eastern and southern Ukraine, killing at least four people and injuring 37, Ukrainian military and local authorities said on Sunday.

title: Hamas Official Says Delegation Left Cairo After Meeting Truce Mediators
content: A Hamas official said on Sunday the group's delegation left Cairo after meeting with Egyptian and Qatari mediators trying to negotiate a ceasefire in the ongoing war in the Gaza Strip.
summary: A Hamas official said on Sunday the group's delegation left Cairo after meeting with Egyptian and Qatari mediators trying to negotiate a ceasefire in the ongoing war in the Gaza Strip.

title: Israel Strikes Lebanon, Says Thwarted Major Hezbollah Attack
content: Israel launched air strikes into Lebanon on Sunday, saying it destroyed "thousands" of Hezbollah rocket launchers and thwarted a major attack, while the Lebanese group insisted it had been able to deliver a drone and rocket barrage of its own.
summary: Israel launched air strikes into Lebanon on Sunday, saying it destroyed "thousands" of Hezbollah rocket launchers and thwarted a major attack, while the Lebanese group insisted it had been able to deliver a drone and rocket barrage of its own.

title: "Nothing To Hide": What Telegram Said After CEO Arrested In France
content: Telegram insisted on Sunday its chief executive Pavel Durov had "nothing to hide" despite his arrest over allegations that he failed to curb criminal activity on the messaging app.
summary: Telegram insisted on Sunday its chief executive Pavel Durov had "nothing to hide" despite his arrest over allegations that he failed to curb criminal activity on the messaging app.

title: France Extends Detention Of Telegram Chief Pavel Durov
content: French judicial authorities on Sunday extended the detention of the Russian-born founder and chief of Telegram Pavel Durov after his arrest at a Paris airport over alleged offences related to the popular but controversial messaging app.
summary: French judicial authorities on Sunday extended the detention of the Russian-born founder and chief of Telegram Pavel Durov after his arrest at a Paris airport over alleged offences related to the popular but controversial messaging app.

title: Hamas Rejects "New Conditions" In US-Led Gaza Ceasefire Talks
content: Hamas said Friday it rejected "new conditions" in a Gaza ceasefire proposal that US-led mediators presented during two days of talks in Qatar.
summary: Hamas said Friday it rejected "new conditions" in a Gaza ceasefire proposal that US-led mediators presented during two days of talks in Qatar.

title: 102-Year-Old Woman Becomes UK's Oldest Skydiver
content: A British woman on Sunday celebrated her 102nd birthday by skydiving out of a plane and said she hoped her daredevil antics might inspire other elderly people to stay active.
summary: A British woman on Sunday celebrated her 102nd birthday by skydiving out of a plane and said she hoped her daredevil antics might inspire other elderly people to stay active.

title: Don't Give Smartphones To Kids Under 11, UK Network Operator Warns Parents
content: One of Britain's biggest mobile network operators said on Sunday it will warn parents they should not give smartphones to children under the age of 11.
summary: One of Britain's biggest mobile network operators said on Sunday it will warn parents they should not give smartphones to children under the age of 11.

title: Attacker Goes On Stabbing Spree In Australia, 4 Injured: Police
content: Four people including a police officer were injured in a stabbing attack in Sydney early on Sunday, police said, the latest in a series of knife assaults in Australia's biggest city this year.
summary: Four people including a police officer were injured in a stabbing attack in Sydney early on Sunday, police said, the latest in a series of knife assaults in Australia's biggest city this year.

title: Famous Indian-Origin Doctor Shot Dead In US
content: An Indian-origin doctor was shot in US in Tuscaloosa on Friday. The victim, identified as Dr Ramesh Babu Peramsetty, died on the spot.
summary: An Indian-origin doctor was shot in US in Tuscaloosa on Friday. The victim, identified as Dr Ramesh Babu Peramsetty, died on the spot.

title: US Rapper Macklemore Cancels Dubai Show Over UAE Role In Sudan War
content: US rapper Macklemore has announced he is cancelling an upcoming show in Dubai over the UAE's involvement in the conflict in Sudan, charges the Gulf state has denied.
summary: US rapper Macklemore has announced he is cancelling an upcoming show in Dubai over the UAE's involvement in the conflict in Sudan, charges the Gulf state has denied.

title: Israel PM Warns Strikes In Lebanon Are Not "Final Word"
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu warned that Sunday's strikes in Lebanon were "not the final word" in his country's military campaign against Lebanese armed group Hezbollah.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu warned that Sunday's strikes in Lebanon were "not the final word" in his country's military campaign against Lebanese armed group Hezbollah.

title: Hezbollah Strikes "A Slap In The Face" For Israel, Says Hamas
content: Palestinian Islamist movement Hamas on Sunday hailed strikes by Lebanon's Hezbollah against Israel, calling it a "strong and focused response".
summary: Palestinian Islamist movement Hamas on Sunday hailed strikes by Lebanon's Hezbollah against Israel, calling it a "strong and focused response".

title: "But No Arrest For Zuckerberg...": Elon Musk Wants Telegram CEO Freed
content: Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk on Sunday came out in support of Telegram Founder Pavel Durov, saying Mark Zuckerberg should instead be arrested for "massive child exploitation" problem on his Meta-owned Instagram.
summary: Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk on Sunday came out in support of Telegram Founder Pavel Durov, saying Mark Zuckerberg should instead be arrested for "massive child exploitation" problem on his Meta-owned Instagram.

title: Syrian Man Confesses To Killing 3 In Germany Stabbing Attack
content: German police said Sunday that a Syrian man has given himself up and confessed to killing three people and wounding eight others in a knife rampage at a street festival.
summary: German police said Sunday that a Syrian man has given himself up and confessed to killing three people and wounding eight others in a knife rampage at a street festival.

title: Haunting Titanic Newspaper Discovered In Wardrobe After 112 Years
content: The Titanic, famously touted as "practically unsinkable" before its maiden voyage, remains one of the deadliest maritime disasters in history.
summary: The Titanic, famously touted as "practically unsinkable" before its maiden voyage, remains one of the deadliest maritime disasters in history.
